conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;No violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Criminal proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court)
docname: CASE OF SEGAME SA v. FRANCE - [Armenian Translation] by the COE Human Rights Trust Fund
issue: Article 1770 (wich became Article 1761 § 2) of the General Tax Code
judges: André Potocki;Ann Power-Forde;Dean Spielmann;Elisabet Fura;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger
